mistral:7b-instruct: This EPO plan from HCF with a monthly premium of $300 is well-suited for an upper-middle income individual managing hypertension. The comprehensive coverage including hospitalization, outpatient services, prescription drugs, and preventive care ensures essential health needs are met. With a high coverage limit of $500,000 and manageable out-of-pocket maximum of $6,500, this plan offers substantial financial protection while remaining affordable for your risk profile.
